dcterms:description: The IEMOCAP dataset contains the acts of 10 speakers in a dyadic conversation fashion, providing text, audio, and video features. It focuses on recognizing six emotion classes: happy, sad, neutral, angry, excited, and frustrated.
dcterms:title: IEMOCAP

dcterms:creator: S. Poria
D. Hazarika
N. Majumder
G. Naik
E. Cambria
R. Mihalcea
dcterms:description: The MELD dataset is an extended version of the EmotionLines dataset, containing conversations from the Friends TV series with multiple speakers. Each utterance is labeled with one of seven emotion types: anger, disgust, sadness, joy, neutral, surprise, and fear.
dcterms:title: MELD
